## atMostOne() function

Verifies that no more than one of the given elements are defined. Returns true if one or none are defined, and false otherwise.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function atMostOne(...args: any): boolean;
```

args


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The spread of arguments to check


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

false if more than one elements are defined, true otherwise
